cause.description:
there are many reasons why eating animals is a bad thing.
including:...
1. Killing animals for their flesh is cruel
2. it is cheaper to grow crops than raise livestock
3. mass slaughter is unethical
4. slaughter houses add mass amounts of CO2 gas into the air
5. You recive more energy per serving in plant matter than animal matter
6. You can't claim to be an animal lover, and then eat one at dinner
cause.mission: educate people about the meat industry
cause.name: Meat Kills
